page.title: 16VANDALISM TODAY BY JOANNE
page.content: Behind my house there is a school for partially-sighted children.The care- taker gives us permission to play there.But a few months ago there were some teen-agers who broke the goal posts and they turned the small climbing frame over and we weren't allowed there anymore.Also where I live there is a park with rubber swings and one night somebody cut all the swings in half.Since then we've had three or four different sets of swings.About one month ago some teenagers came up and they all got on the round-about and the screw came loose and ehen you got on,it went lop-sided and the person who was lighter would go up.That happened a few times then they took the round- about away.It was gone for at least three weeks and they put it back. Since then we have had no vandalism.
